  • Constructor Details

    • ClimbSegment

      public ClimbSegment(int stageId, SegmentType type, double location, double averageGradient, double length)
      Constructor of ClimbSegment class.
      Parameters:
      stageId - ID of the stage the segment belongs to.
      type - the type of segment i.e. Sprint, HC.
      location - where within the stage the climb is (in kilometers).
      averageGradient - Average gradient of the climb.
      length - How long the climb is (in kilometers).
